DOC.brief_summary: Single dose tranexamic acid (TA) before dacryocystorhinostomy (DCR) operation: a prospective, double blind, placebo controlled study. The study hypothesis: TA in DCR might reduce the intraoperative and postoperative bleeding in DCR surgery, and might reduce the duration of the surgery.
DOC.criteria: obstruction of nasolacrimal pathway eligible for DCR surgery 18 years of age or older warfarin treatment renal insufficiency pregnancy mental retardation tendency to bleed thromboembolic disease thrombophilia
